name: Technigon
overview: Technigon is a creative company that specializes in developing dedicated software and implementing innovative IT solutions. Our main goal is creating mobile applications that will make you use all the potential of your business. We will make your tools digitalized - with Technigon they will be mobile and cross-platform! We also develop pre-installed mobile software and mobile applications that fulfill all your requirements. The process of designing our products is based on our customers’ needs and is supported by detailed analysis of the functional requirements of your company. In our work we use the newest and most proven technologies. We strive to build a fruitful cooperation with our clients, therefore after completing each project we provide necessary expertise, technical help and trainings. In order to thoroughly familiarize you with the projects realized by us, we would like to invite you to our website. At www.technigon.com you will find all the necessary information.
